form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, Form N-4 ( Rev 07/17)N

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service Applic START HERE - Please Type or Print FOR IN Returned Part 1. Information about you. Family Given Middle Name ADVANI Name Rukmani Initial D. U.S. Mailing Address . Care of Gulu Advani Resubmitted Street Number Apt. and Name 1218 St. Matthew Way # City County Los Altos Santa Clara State ZIP Reloc Sent California Code 94024 Date of Birth Country (month/day/year) Jan. 15, 1907 of Birth (Undivided) India Social A Security # 557-15-8797 # A20 337 856 Reloc Rec'd Part 2. Basis for Eligibility (check one). a. I have been a permanent resident for at least live (5) years b. I have been a permanent resident for at least three (3) years and have been married to a United States Citizen for those three years. Applicant Interviewed C. I am a permanent resident child of United States citizen parent(s) d. I am applying on the basis of qualifying military service in the Armed Forces of the U.S. and have attached completed Forms N-426 and G-325B At interview e. Other. (Please specify section of law) request naturalization ceremony at court Part 3. Additional information about you. Remarks Date you became a permanent Port admitted with an immmigrant visa or INS Office resident (month/day/year) where granted adjustment of status. May 9, 1977 San Francisco Citizenship Indian Name on alien registration card (if different than in Part 1) Same Other names used since you became a permanent resident (including maiden name) None Sex Male Height Marital Status: Single Divorced Female Married Widowed 4'6" Can you speak, read and write English ? No Yes. (I qualify to take my naturalization Action Absences from the U.S.: in my native language) Have you been absent from the U.S. since becoming a permanent resident? No Yes If you answered "Yes" complete the following. Begin with your most recent absence If you need more room to explain the reason for an absence or to list more trips, continue on separate paper. Did absence last Date left U.S. Date returned 6 months or more? Destination Reason for trip 10/02/91 10/16/91 Yes No India Visit relatives To Be Completed by 10/07/89 11/01/89 Yes No " 11 " Attorney or Representative if any Oct 1986 08/12/87 Yes No " " " Fill in box if G-28 is attached to represent the applicant 10/28/85 03/11/86 Yes No " 11 11 VOLAG# 12/20/81 05/01/82 Yes No " " " 12/01/80 01/17/81 Yes No 11 11 " ATTY State License # Unknown 11/05/79 Yes No 11 " Form N.400 (Rev 07/17/91)N Continued on back. 142506
